attributes.action: ensure the instant removal of any petition that does not recognise the diversity of the British population in terms of religious belief or anything else that is covered by the discrimination laws of this country, thus no longer inflicting bigoted views on the tolerant majority of the British population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These petitions usually consist of Christians wanting to force their religion onto everyone else, especially impressionable young children, in opposition to Article 9 of the European Convention on Human Rights, enshrined into UK law in the Human Rights Act 1998.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
